participant_1.background:
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
i am a night owl.
i was born in san francisco.
I am trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
my class has 26 kids.

participant_2.background:
I saw an enormous whale while I was fishing with my uncle.
i enjoy being outside.
I enjoy strawberries because they are a sweet and juicy treat.
i work as a receptionist at a lawyers office.
I'd love to take my kids to the ballet in air conditioning.

content.text: I'm doing well, just got home from work! How are you?
I'm doing okay, trying to quit smoking. It's not easy!
That's a good goal, I'm sure you can do it! I saw an enormous whale while I was fishing with my uncle, it was amazing!
Wow! That sounds like an amazing experience! I've never seen a whale in real life, I'd love to one day.
You should go on a whale watching tour! It's so much fun, and you get to see lots of different kinds of whales.
That's a great idea! I'll have to look into it.
You're welcome! I hope you get to see a whale soon!
By the way, I work as a receptionist at a lawyer's office.
Oh, that sounds interesting! What's it like?
It's pretty fun, I get to meet a lot of different people.
That sounds cool! I'd love to work in a law office one day.
You should do it! It's a great career.
Thanks for the advice! I'll keep that in mind.
